contentBody.headMarkup:
<title>Welcome to LWC Communities!</title>

<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/slds/salesforce-lightning-design-system-part1.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/slds/salesforce-lightning-design-system-part2.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/slds/salesforce-lightning-design-system-part3.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/slds/salesforce-lightning-design-system-part4.css?{ versionKey }"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />



<!-- branding stylesheets-->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/styles.css }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/print.css }" media="print"/>
<style>
/* Reset spacing around your custom container */
.ne-lwc-container {
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
}

/* Kill Experience Cloud column padding */
.ne-lwc-container {
    width: 100%;
}

/* Target parent column */
.forceCommunityColumn:has(.ne-lwc-container) {
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

/* Target row spacing */
.forceCommunityRow:has(.ne-lwc-container) {
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

/* Target section spacing */
.forceCommunitySection:has(.ne-lwc-container) {
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
}
</style>
